Michigan Ongoing Health & Safety Training: Refresher 2025
Section 1: Building & Physical Premises Safety

Playground Safety

The remainder of this section will be devoted to discussing safety on the playground. Children love to play on playgrounds. This play provides many benefits to them. They receive the benefits of outside air and sunshine. They have an opportunity to release their physical energy and expand their physical development. Children also are motivated by the desire to overcome the challenges they face with the next level of accomplishment on a playset. Playgrounds are so much fun for children! As child care providers we have a vital responsibility to ensure that fun does not turn into an injury or tragedy. In this section we will:

  • Discuss the risks and hazards associated with playgrounds, and...
  • Explore strategies to decrease those risks in your child care site.

In the Support Material section at the end of this session, you will find links for two excellent resources from the Consumer Product Safety Commission: The Outdoor Home Playground Safety Handbook and the Public Playground Safety Handbook (which serves as a guide for Child Care Centers).
